name: The Cali Girl Collection
description:
From left to right: Gumdrop, Mermaid Tail, and Surf's Up.

On sale for a limited time, with free shipping.

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

name: The Metallic Collection
description:
Includes one of each (from left to right): Emerald Sky, Khloe, and Cosmic

On sale for a limited time, with free shipping.

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

name: Disco 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Disco is a light, bright retro green with a high gloss finish. Two coats required.

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

name: Mermaid Tail 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Mermaid Tail is a bright aqua/turquoise creme lacquer. A justifiably popular color, this polish delivers a super shine and full coverage on the first coat.

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

name: Paradise 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Paradise is a bright blue creme lacquer. Delivering full coverage on the first coat, this high gloss nail polish will take you away to a tropical land and beyond.

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

(Bottom picture courtesy of lacquerorleaveher.blogspot.com.)

name: Emerald Sky 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Emerald Sky is a blackened teal shimmer with hints of blue and even purple. This high gloss lacquer is simply gorgeous.

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).

(The middle picture is courtesy of thequeenofpolish.blogspot.com and is shown without a top coat.)

(The bottom picture is courtesy of lacquerorleaveher.blogspot.com.)

name: Cosmic 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Cosmic is a rich blue metallic with undeniable depth. Channel your inner rock star with this high gloss nail polish.

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

name: Gumdrop 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
Gumdrop is a bold and girly shade of pink that's easy on the eyes. Two coats of Gumdrop and you're ready to rock!

A base coat is recommended to prevent possible staining, and a top coat for extended wear!

name: I Heart You 5-free Nail Lacquer
description:
I Heart You is a sheer pinky-coral polish dazzled with multi-colored sparkles and glitter. It also has both light and dark pink hearts. Perfect for the young, and young at heart. Great for nail art!

Authority's nail polish is always 5-FREE (free of Formaldehyde, DBP, Toluene, Camphor, and Formaldehyde Resin), VEGAN FRIENDLY (never made with any animal by-products), and CRUELTY FREE (never tested on animals).
